title: PSID Earnings Panel Data (1976–1982)
description:
Description
Panel data on earnings of 595 individuals for the years 1976–1982,
originating from the Panel Study of Income Dynamics.
reference:
The data were originally analyzed by Cornwell and Rupert (1988) and employed
for assessing various instrumental-variable estimators for panel models
(including the Hausman-Taylor model). Baltagi and Khanti-Akom (1990) reanalyzed
the data, made corrections to the data and also suggest modeling with a different
set of instruments.

parameters.smsa:
factor. Does the individual reside in a SMSA (standard
metropolitan statistical area)?
parameters.south: factor. Does the individual reside in the South?
parameters.industry: factor. Does the individual work in a manufacturing industry?
parameters.ethnicity:
factor indicating ethnicity.
Is the individual African-American ("afam") or not ("other")?
parameters.union: factor. Is the individual's wage set by a union contract?
parameters.occupation:
factor. Is the individual a white-collar ("white")
or blue-collar ("blue") worker?

format: A data frame containing 7 annual observations on 12 variables for 595 individuals.
